tuv.seg: Overview Document Overview of the Irish education system The Irish education system is made up of first, second and third-level education and of further education
Overview Document Forléargas ar chóras oideachais na hÉireann Cuimsíonn córas oideachais na hÉireann oideachas chéad, dara agus tríú leibhéal agus breisoideachas
Almost all education is funded by the State
Tá beagnach gach oideachas maoinithe ag an Stát
The Irish Constitution (Bunreacht na hÉireann) contains specific articles on education, religion, and the family, which affect how education is organised
Tá cur síos anseo ar na hAirteagail de Bhunreacht na hÉireann a bhaineann le hoideachas, le creideamh agus leis an teaghlach agus an tionchar atá acu ar an gcóras oideachais
There are arrangements and conditions for exempting certain students from the study of Irish in post-primary school and in certificate examinations at post-primary level
Tá cur síos anseo ar na socruithe agus coinníollacha a bhaineann le díolúine ón nGaeilge atá ar fáil do scoláirí áirithe in iarbhunscoileanna agus i scrúdaithe iarbhunscoileanna
This document describes the special arrangements for the education of children with special educational needs
Déanann an doiciméad seo cur síos ar na socruithe speisialta d’oideachas leanaí a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta oideachais acu
Teaching your child at home
Do leanbh a mhúineadh sa bhaile
Information on the rights of parents to educate their children at home and how home education is regulated and assessed
Faisnéis maidir le cearta tuismitheoirí chun oideachas a chur ar a gcuid leanaí sa bhaile agus maidir leis an gcaoi a dhéantar oideachas sa bhaile a rialú agus a mheasúnú
Organisations such as parents' associations, parents' councils and other agencies provide parents with support and information about their children's education
Cuireann eagraíochtaí ar nós cumann tuismitheoirí, comhairlí tuismitheoirí agus gníomhaireachtaí eile tacaíocht agus faisnéis ar fáil do thuismitheoirí faoi oideachas a leanaí
Measures to address educational disadvantage
Bearta le dul i ngleic le míbhuntáiste oideachasúil
Delivering Equality of Opportunity in Schools (DEIS) and other initiatives provide supports to address educational disadvantage
Soláthraíonn 'Ag Soláthar Comhdheiseanna i Scoileanna' (SCS) agus tionscadail eile tacaíochtaí chun dul i ngleic le míbhuntáiste oideachasúil
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
